game.name: Shelldiver
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 깊게 숨을 들이쉬고 이 아늑한 점진적 게임에 뛰어들어 보세요. 젤리피시를 팔기 위해 사업을 시작하려는 노년의 거북이에 대한 이야기입니다. 장비를 업그레이드하고, 생물군계를 탐험하며, 거북이 마을을 도와주세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take a deep breath and dive right into this cozy incremental game about a senior turtle trying to start a business selling jellyfish. Upgrade your equipment, explore biomes, and help your turtly village!

reviewHighlights.text: I went in with low expectations because the main character was a geriatric turtle capturing jellyfish with a bubble gun. I was pleasantly surprised by...
Very fun, although the loop gets repetitive. Either way, was fun to 100%, very cute. Fug the jellyfish, sell them britches. 9/10 - mew mew
